lead_paragraph: SCHRADE--Robert. Sevenars Concerts honors the life of Robert Schrade, beloved co-founder with wife Rolande. Incomparable pianist, teacher, father and grandfather, he inspired all. Donations in his honor may be made to: Sevenars Concerts, c/o R. C. Schrade, 80 E. End Ave, 3G, New York, NY 10028. Service: St. James Church, 865 Madison Ave., NYC, January 11, 11am. 1/3
